Commands.Beast Rush: 3-hit melee BRV attackSelf: 2 turns ATK Up I
Commands.Jecht Slash: 4-hit Fire melee BRV attack + HP attackSelf: 2 turns PHY ATK Up I
Commands.Meteor Shot: 4-HIT BRV+HP attack.BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV.Deals 50% HP damage to other targets.Grants Ultimate Resolve for 6 turns.If Jecht breaks an enemy within 6 turns after use, nullifies action delay and grants a free turn that does not count towards the total turn count (except during Summon Phase/Friend Support).

Artifacts.Buffed BRV Up: Raises Max BRV by 5% while buffed.
Artifacts.Bravery HP Damage: Raises BRV by 10% of Initial BRV after taking HP damage.
Artifacts.Mighty Beast Rush: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Beast Rush by 10%.
Artifacts.Mighty Jecht Slash: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Jecht Slash by 10%.

Passives.Beast Rush Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Beast Rush.
Passives.Critical Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with critical hits.
Passives.Break Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Jecht Slash Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Jecht Slash.
Passives.BRV Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Beast Rush Charge: Increases the max uses of Beast Rush by 1.
Passives.Break Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Jecht Slash Charge: Increases the max uses of Jecht Slash by 1.
Passives.Previous Ace Striker: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn when BRV equals 0.
Passives.Initial Buff Speed: Tremendous increase to INT BRV and slight increase to SPD with active buffs
Passives.Beast Rush Extension: When using Beast Rush, Beast Rush+:•Moderate damage boost•Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
Passives.Buffed Attack: Moderately raises ATK with active buffs
Passives.Jecht Slash Extension: When using Jecht Slash, Jecht Slash+:•Moderate BRV damage boost•Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
